1.「おおっ。派手に やってやがんな。: Oh, wow. They're doing it in a big way.

3.「なぁに ムスっとしてんだ ラスタ。| ほら。こいつが <pc>。| さっき話し: What are you sulking about, Rasta? Here. This|is <pc>. That's the legendary talent|I was telling you about!

4.「紹介するぜ <pc>。| こいつは ラスターシャ！| うち一番の カリスマ踊り: Let me introduce you, <pc>. This is|Rastasha! She's our most charismatic dancer.

5.「まるで 私以外にも 踊り子を | 抱えているかのような クチぶりね。: You talk as if you have other dancers besides|me.

6.「グワッハハハ！ 少数精鋭は オレの信条！| 共に 伝説を築くに ふさわしい|: Gwah-ha-ha-ha! The elite few are my credo! I|only call on those who are worthy of building|a legend with me.

7.「そんなことより ラスタ。| ……どうだ？ こいつなら いけるだろ？| 例の儀式: That's not what I'm talking about, Rasta.|How's it going? He's good, right? He seems to|have completed the ritual without any trouble.

9.「いやあ。ビックリしたぜ。| はじめて ラスタに会った時以来の| 衝撃だったな。: Oh, man. I was so surprised. I haven't seen|Rasta since the first time I met him. I mean,|his pelvis is so...

11.「そうそう！ 骨盤が てんでダメ……！ | まさに 廃盤……: Yes, yes! My pelvis is completely ruined. It's|really out of order...

12.「って……ええええっ！ ダメ？| 骨盤……ダメ？: I mean... eh! No? Pelvis... no?

13.「まさか……通過儀礼を こなしたくらいで| 本気で 私の合方がつとまると 思って:
You didn't really think... that you'd be able|to keep my partner just by going through the|rite of passage, did you? If that's the case,|
|you're a very naive girl.

16.「じつは ラスタは今 合方……| 一緒に踊る パートナーを探しててよ。| ちいっ: Actually, Rasta is currently looking for a|partner to dance with. He's a little|preoccupied.

17.「勝手に 志願してくる奴ぁ 多いが | ろくな奴が いなくてよ。プロデューサーと:
There are a lot of people who volunteer on|their own, but there aren't any good ones.|I've been having a hard time finding a|
|producer I can help...

18.「そこに現れた逸材が お前ってわけよ。 | 今回は ちぃっと 時期が早すぎたが…: And you're the one who showed up. This time|it's a little too early... but I'm sure you'll|get the recognition you deserve in time.

19.「他の奴にゃ クチも聞かなかったんだから| それに比べりゃあ 上出来よ。| ちょ: I didn't hear a single mouthful from the other|guys, so I'm doing pretty well compared to|them. I'm a little too skittish, though.

20.「まあ 優れた合方と ユニットを組むのは| <pc>伝説 誕生への 近道だからよ: Well, forming a unit with a superior partner|is a shortcut to the birth of the legend of|<pc>. For now, trust me and work on|your tricks.

21.「おっと！ まずは 転職しねぇと| 始まらねぇよな。グワッハハハ！: Oops! First of all, you have to change jobs,|right? Gwahahahaha!

22.「なんと！ オレがバッチリ ダーマ神殿に| 根回しして もうすでに 転職できるよ: Oh my God! I've already arranged with|Alltrades Abbey for you to get a new job.|Sounds like a producer to me, right?

23.「なあに。礼には およばねぇよ。| 踊り子プロデューサー ひと筋２０年。| これ: Hey. You don't have to thank me. Dancing|producer for 20 years. All this before|breakfast!

24.「そう思って じつは さっき | ダーマ神殿まで 根回ししに| 行ってきたんだが: So, in fact, I went to Alltrades Abbey earlier|to lay the groundwork...

25.「なんと お前 すでに| 踊り子に 転職できるらしいじゃねぇか！| やっぱ 逸材: What a surprise! I heard you can already|change your job to a dancer! A gem is|something else after all.

26.「せめて 何かしてやれないかと 思ってな。 | <pc>伝説の 幕開けを祝して|: I thought I'd do something for you at least. I|have prepared a gift to celebrate the|beginning of the legend of <pc>.

27.「つーわけで 歌って踊って 実力つけて | さっさと ラスタに 認められてくんな: So, sing, dance, get good at it, and hurry up|and get Rasta's approval! I'm looking forward|to the birth of the unit.

28.「そうだな……レベル３０以上の| 踊り子になれば さすがのラスタも| 認めてくれ: Well...I guess if you become a level 30+|dancer, as expected Rasta will approve of you.

29.「そしたら また オレんとこに来てくれよ。| ラスタにバシっと 成長を見せつけて: Then come visit me again. Let's show Rasta how|much you've grown!

30.「あ！ 言い忘れてたが このテント……| 勝手に入ると ラスタが怒るんだ。| そ: Ah! I forgot to mention that this tent... if|you enter without permission, Rasta will get|angry. Be careful with that. See you later!

31.「そんな人と組んでも 足手まといなだけよ。| 悪いけど 遊びじゃないの。| あな: Working with a person like that will only slow|you down. I'm sorry, but this is not a game.|I'm not willing to compromise at your level.

32.「……しかし ちいっと前までは| 営業に行くのも 面倒がるような| ものぐさ踊り: ...but a little while ago, I was a lazy dancer|who didn't even bother to go to the office...

33.「最近 人が変わったように 意識高くなってよ。| 踊りが達者なのは もとからなん:
Lately, he's become a very conscious person,|as if he's changed. I've always been a good|dancer, but it's a wonder I'm still able to|
|dance. Gwahahahaha!
